name: ContextTest
description: Unit tests for the Context class, focusing on various illegal and legal configurations.

test_cases.name: testContextIllegalMinChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with an illegal minimum number of children throws a RuntimeException.

test_cases.name: testContextIllegalMaxChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with an illegal maximum number of children throws a RuntimeException.

test_cases.name: testContextIllegalMinMaxChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with an illegal combination of minimum and maximum children throws a RuntimeException.

test_cases.name: testContextLegalChildren
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with legal children configurations does not throw an exception.

test_cases.name: testContextSelectorNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with a null selector throws a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testContextSplitterNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with a null splitter throws a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testContextNodeFactoryNullThrowsNPE
test_cases.description: Tests that creating a Context with a null node factory throws a NullPointerException.
